name: A Dark Room
description: A player lights a fire in a dark room. Fun game :D

name: Minecraft: Bedrock Edition
description: A trial version of the real Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. Pure credits to now.gg for this.

name: Fireboy and Watergirl
description: Fireboy and Watergirl is the first cooperative platformer game in the Fireboy and Watergirl series.

name: Duck Life
description: The future of the farm is in your hands! Train your duck to run, fly and swim its way to victory so you can save the farm with your riches.

name: Duck Life 2
description: Become a world champion in the successor to Duck Life!

name: Duck Life 3
description: The third game in the Duck Life series!

name: Duck Life 4
description: Super scary... yeah the fourth game. What even happened?

name: osu!
description: Rhythm is just a *click* away! If you experience any input lag be sure to read over the osu! FAQ page.

name: Friendly Fire
description: What dark secrets does this twisted world hold?

name: Slope
description: Slope game is a fantastic speed run game where you can drive a ball rolling on tons of slopes and obstacles. See how far you can go in this endless course.

name: vex 3
description: vex 3 is a fascinating game. Your task is to Take Vex through the levels by running, jumping, sliding and swimming while avoiding dangerous obstacles.

name: vex 4
description: VEX 4 takes Vex to the next level! This fast paced stickman game puts your skills to the test. Run, jump, slide, swim and avoid obstacles, VEX 4 has it all.

name: vex 5
description: Now, you can meet cute Stickman again in Vex 5. Vex 5 is the 5th platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps.

name: PUBG MOBILE: Arcane
description: Battle royale game thing.

name: Gacha Life
description: Handcraft your very own anime-inspired stories in Gacha Life by Lunime. Wholesome game? Oh no.

name: Roblox
description: Why... well its here now enjoy.

name: Among Us
description: Why must you do this.

name: Last Train Home
description: This is a short horror-adventure game about being stuck on a train. May take awhile to load.

name: Village Arsonist
description: Village Arsonist is a 2D physics-based puzzle game. May take awhile to load... a long while.

name: Minecraft JS
description: Minecraft but made in Javascript.

name: What the Road Brings
description: A pseudo, vaporwave 3d racer with an epic soundtrack and art style. May take awhile to load.

name: Snake
description: Eat the apples in this classic retro game. But don't hit the wall, or eat your own tail! How long can you survive?

name: Super Mario 64
description: A classic. Super Mario 64 is a 1996 platform game for the Nintendo 64 and the first Super Mario game to feature 3D gameplay.

name: Zork Clone
description: Zork is an interactive fiction computer game.

name: Pick Up Prison
description: At the beginning... There was nothing... There is a prisoner in a cell with nothing. May take awhile to load.

name: Helo Storm
description: Endless helicopter and Jeep shoot 'em up based on the 80's arcade classic 'Silkworm'.

name: Retrohaunt
description: A creepy retro horror game with interesting graphics and mood.

name: T-Rex Game (chrome://dino)
description: The T-Rex Runner game, an Easter Egg in Google Chrome.

name: Run 3
description: Use the arrow keys to run and jump. Land on a side wall to rotate the world. (Broken)

name: Die in the Dungeon
description: Die in the Dungeon is a deck-building, turn-based roguelite. May take awhile to load.

name: Trimps
description: Pure grind.

name: Gopher Cart
description: Fun driving side scroller game with epic gophers.

name: Cookie Clicker
description: You feel like making cookies but no one wants to eat them. Click on the cookie to bake and eat.

name: Particle Clicker
description: An addictive incremental game that teaches players the history of high energy particle physics.

name: Evil Glitch
description: Strange glitches appear in your dimension, can you stop them before they assimilate your world?

name: Pac-man
description: The classic.

name: Flappy Bird
description: Click on the screen, or use your spacebar to get started. Fly as far as you can without hitting a pipe.

name: Bounce Back
description: A charming and addictive little Zelda inspired roguelike adventure game.

name: The Chroma Incident
description: The Achromats have taken the world's color offline!

name: Sleeping Beauty
description: Into a profound slumber she sank, surrounded only by dense brambles, thorns and roses.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris Â® is the addictive puzzle game that started it all, embracing our universal desire to create order out of chaos.

name: The House
description: An interesting horror style game.

name: The Pond
description: Use Mouse1 to move around. A game like Slither.io.

name: NS Shaft
description: A fun platformer.

name: Game Off
description: A collection of really fun games, particularly anti-matter which is inspired by Portal.
Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. Try to beat your high score!

name: Asteroids
description: Asteroids is a space-themed multidirectional shooter arcade game!

name: Breaklock
description: Link the dots to find the lock pattern. After every attempt the game will tell you how many dots you got right.

name: Backcountry
description: Taking place in the wild west mine and do jobs to earn money! Use your mouse to navigate by clicking.

name: Breakout
description: Break all the bricks and volley the ball back and forth in this skill-based classic styled game!

name: Chess
description: Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on a checkered board with 64 squares arranged in an 8x8 square grid.

name: Connect 3
description: Basically like bejeweled.

name: Towermaster
description: Build a tower! Stack objects on top of each other without the building falling. How high can you go?

name: Geometry Dash
description: Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

name: Hextris
description: An addictive puzzle game inspired by Tetris.

name: Astray
description: A WebGL maze game built with Three.js and Box2dWeb.

name: Konnekt
description: Fight against nodes and viruses! An interesting puzzle game developed by MONSTERKODI.

name: Push Back
description: A cool physics game!

name: Underrun
description: Explore deep underground in this doom-like game. Kill enemies, explore and progress. Use WASD to move and Mouse1 to shoot.

name: JS Racer
description: Want to race online? Enjoy an old age like racing game!

name: xx142-b2.exe
description: It's the year 2413, and aliens have enslaved humanity.

name: Factory Balls Forever
description: A puzzle game where you have to color the balls correctly! Use different tools to cover up the ball before start painting over it.
